#summary An administrator's guide to using Photohunt (work in progress).
#labels Phase-Support,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This guide will detail the steps needed to deploy Photo Hunt onto a web server.


= Details =

  * Download the latest version from [http://code.google.com/p/photohunt/downloads/list/ Google Code].
  * Download and install [http://tomcat.apache.org/download-55.cgi Apache Tomcat 5.5.20].
  * Using the Tomcat Manager, deploy the Photo Hunt war file.
